Those having trouble with 'need a serial', steam_api.dll and/or confusion about where to place the crack file...

I had the steam_api.dll issue to begin with and it was nothing more than the result of having placed the crack file in the wrong folder. Place the executable in "C:\Program Files\1C Company\Men of War. Assault Squad"

It's a bit confusing as the "Men of War. Assault Squad" folder's standard 'folder' icon has been replaced with the game executable's icon.

Could someone please post a comment with a walk through on how to install the game after downloading it? Having problems here.. :)

INSTALL NOTES

2. Mount or burn the image
3. Install
4. Copy the content from the SKIDROW folder to the game installation
5. Support the companies, which software you actually enjoy

For anyone who doesn't know how to do it you
1-mount/burn the image
2-install it
3-go to where u downloaded it and open the iso file
4-copy the things inside the file called SKIDROW and paste it in your install directory.
5-If you don't know where it is you go to your start menu and type 'men of war' in the search bar then you right click the link, and click open file location and you paste the stuff in(copy and replace)
